showScoreExcerpt: "The miracle of this play is that the circle feels as if it is extending to embrace us all."
bwwExcerpt: By no means do I want to give the impression that “Liberation” is the kind of good-for-you didactic show that feels like an assignment. Not only does its sustained pace make the story downright suspenseful — we quickly become invested in these women and wonder what will become of them — but spending...
